name: Agua Fresca
description: Agua Fresca means “fresh water” in Spanish. This sweet and tart hibiscus refresher will cool you down on a hot summer day!
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot – 12 Cup, combine mix with water. Steep 10 min or overnight.
Strain into pitcher; discard solids. Pour over ice or refrigerate until chilled.

products.name: Agua Fresca Drink Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Say 'hola' to your new summer drink: Agua Fresca! This beauty lands perfectly between water and juice, offering a refreshing blend of sweet and slightly tart hibiscus flavours. It's the perfect addition to Taco Tuesday, and it also makes gorgeous lattes, cocktails, and zero proof drinks.
